summary: Implements an image-to-image diffusion pipeline based on Stable Diffusion XL, enhanced with ControlNet and Prompt-Aligned Generation (PAG) capabilities, while supporting adapters such as LoRA, IP‑Adapter, and textual inversion for flexible conditioning and fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Enable developers and creators to generate or modify images from existing visuals using textual prompts and additional control signals, delivering high‑quality, customizable AI‑driven visual content for media production, design, and marketing applications.
